landing.heroSubtitle: Bifrost Link transforms Google Sheets into automated voice calls and WhatsApp reminders. Deadlines become commands. Data becomes action.

features.label: The Realms
features.subtitle: Each feature is a gateway between your cloud data and real-world action.

loom.title: Sheets Management
loom.desc: Connect or create Google Sheets with one click. Preview data, rename sheets, and manage connections. The threads of your data, gathered in one place.

stentor.title: Voice Enforcement
stentor.desc: Overdue tasks trigger real phone calls with AI-generated speech. Deadlines don't whisper — they command. With WhatsApp fallback if you don't answer.

threads.title: WhatsApp Reminders
threads.desc: Cron-scheduled rules check your sheets and send WhatsApp messages when entries are missing. The threads that connect your columns to your daily life.

allSeeing.title: Dashboard
allSeeing.desc: One view across all realms. Connected sheets, active rules, recent interactions, and a setup checklist. The eye that watches over your entire system.

howItWorks.label: The Crossing
howItWorks.subtitle: From silent spreadsheet to ringing phone in under five minutes.

step1.title: Connect the Realm
step1.desc: Link your Google Sheet or create a new one. Bifrost reads your data securely via OAuth — no passwords stored.

step2.title: Weave the Threads
step2.desc: Create rules: pick a sheet, set a cron schedule, choose a column. Define what triggers a reminder and what the message says.

step3.title: Unleash the Voice
step3.desc: Sit back. When deadlines pass or entries are missing, Bifrost calls you, messages you, and doesn't stop until it's done.

bridge.label: The Bifrost
bridge.subtitle: Your spreadsheets hold the plan. Bifrost Link enforces it. Every overdue task, every missed entry, every forgotten habit — turned into an unavoidable action.
bridge.etherealDesc: Your tasks, deadlines, health metrics, and habits — all living in the cloud. Structured, silent, waiting.
bridge.midgardDesc: Voice calls that won't be ignored. WhatsApp messages that arrive on time. Data turned into action, in your hand.
bridge.feat1: AI voice calls via ElevenLabs text-to-speech with custom messages
bridge.feat2: WhatsApp fallback if you miss the call — the message always reaches you
bridge.feat3: Cron scheduling with human-readable presets or custom expressions
bridge.feat4: Fernet-encrypted OAuth tokens — your Google credentials are never stored in plain text
bridge.feat5: Self-hosted with Docker Compose — your data stays on your infrastructure

cta.label: Cross the Bridge
cta.subtitle: Deploy Bifrost Link on your own infrastructure. Open source, self-hosted, fully yours.

landing.footer: Bifrost Link. Bridging Data and Destiny.
